channel.title: Reference on discord.py Bot Tutorial
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on discord.py Bot Tutorial

item.title: Listeners
item.description: If a listener is undocumented you almost certainly do not need it, and will very very rarely require its use. This is as much a reference for myself to simply remember these listeners as it is meant to be useful to others. Use these listeners with care and understanding, if you didn't come here looking for them you probably don't need them, and should turn back. This is not a detailed guide on how to use these listeners, it is just a reference to their existance.
